<script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
      $items = $('div#TOC li');
      $items.each(function(idx) {
        num_ul = $(this).parentsUntil('#TOC').length;
        $(this).css({'text-indent': num_ul * 10, 'padding-left': 0});
      });

    });
</script>
